Text: RE Centanna Storage Cc Crhis The invoice for is on SAP I found a payment from Duke Energy Field Services to settle storage fees due post bankruptcy dated These funds are on SAP in the amount of short from the invoice of I have screen prints on each and will bring them to you and turn over to the appropriate party Thanks Larry Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Tuesday June AM To Polsky Phil Cash Larry Concannon Ruth Cc Hamic Priscilla Germany Chris Subject Centanna Storage Priscilla was asking me if we ever paid for the Centanna storage that we sold to Duke Energy Field Services LP I see that deal was entered in Sitara on April by Joe Parks The deal is a sale of dth to Duke Energy Field Services at on This is showing up in AR as an outstanding receivable and Priscilla is wondering if the cash may be sitting in another account or different Duke entity Any ideas
